narratives.evidence_quote: इन वजहों से रूस की हालत खस्ता हुई है, जबकि वह दुनिया का दूसरा शक्तिशाली देश माना जाता रहा है।
narratives.reasoning: The sentence attributes Russia's worsening condition to external factors (sanctions by Western countries) and contrasts it with its former status as a major power, framing Russia as a victim of Western pressure.

subnarratives.subnarrative_name: URW: Russia is the Victim: Other
subnarratives.evidence_quote: इन वजहों से रूस की हालत खस्ता हुई है, जबकि वह दुनिया का दूसरा शक्तिशाली देश माना जाता रहा है।
subnarratives.reasoning: The text attributes Russia's worsened condition to Western restrictions, portraying Russia as a victim rather than focusing on its own actions; there is no explicit claim of Russophobia or that Ukraine is extremists, so this aligns with the 'Other' subnarrative under the Russia is the Victim parent.
